page.title: 15 RIVER PLYM LIFE
page.content: If you explore the shallow area of The River Plym you will mostly find a rather small insect called the pondskater.The pondskater is a carnivore and acts as a bully as it only eats smaller creatures.As weeds grow in the river so will the snail population.The water snail is a vegetarian and only eats weed. A little deeper the water boatman appears.This creature is also a carnivore and eats mostly pondskaters. Below the surface,water scorpions wait to seize smaller river creatures. As the river gets deeper,the river flows faster.These conditions are perfect for elvers ,fish and toads. Elvers and trout often use these conditions to swim faster and escape from their enemies. Toads lurk under stones and come out for food at night.
